name: Projectile
description:
Projectile is a 3d multiplayer game. With this game you can shoot your friends and make new ones with other players. click the executable and your in the game.  Right now the game size is only 90KB and the dll is 1MB. This game is vary small and easy to run. All you need to get connected is a connection.  

New Gun every week!

The Top text shows your player color and your score. The spheres at the right shows your lifes until you reset. The bottom shows your guns stats and dash. 

Controls:

WASD - controls

LEFT SHIFT - run

LEFT CONTROL - charge (charging can be used to run and doubles your damage for any gun. )

NOTE: To charge you need to have some player score.

If we can get this game to sell 50 copies,  I will have enough to put it on steam!!
